p: Data are shown as the mean ± standard deviation or median (interquartile range) for continuous variables, and as n (%) for categorical variables. Comparisons between the CI and control groups and between the CI-term and CI-preterm group were performed using Mann–Whitney U test. Proportions were compared using Fisher’s exact test. Statistical analyses were conducted using SPSS software (version 23.0, SPSS, Inc., Chicago, IL, USA). P < 0.05 was considered as statistically significant.
